column1: Smoque BBQ////Not much can be said that hasn't already.  Smoque is where its at.  Unfortunately for my waistline
column2: this location is by my house and their downtown location is by my office
column3: so you can imagine I order this way too much.  Sliced brisket is amazing
column4: brisket chili is a great side
column5: and both dessert options (peach cobbler and bread pudding) are wonderful.  Bread pudding especially...whew.
